attr.title: Goopty Goo
attr.desc: A game inspired by *The Floor is Lava* and squishing enemies in Mario games. After you stomp the first goo square in each room, you can't touch the floor until you have squished all the goo in that level.
attr.inst: Ready to run. Thanks to Dylan Brown (https://dylanbrowngames.itch.io) for permitting PortMaster to include the game files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run. Thanks to [Dylan Brown](https://dylanbrowngames.itch.io) for permitting PortMaster to include the game files.
